betterquesting:10.desc:8:
...the whole world looks like a nail. When looking for good tool materials, see "GregTech Material Tools" tab in NEI. Remember that NEI bookmarks are your friends.

The GT tools each have special uses.

Screwdriver - Used on covers to change their behavior.

Wrench - Used to change the output direction on a GT machine, or to break it. Can also disconnect/connect pipes or enable their built in shutter.

Crowbar - Remove covers from machines or pipes.

Wire cutters - Connecting/disconnecting/breaking wires/cables.

Soft mallet - Turning machines on/off.

Hammer - Prospecting for ores in a limited way in front of you, and smashing ore blocks into crushed ores.

On a side note, Tin Pipes need a Steel Wrench to dismantle, so don't place them randomly.
betterquesting:10.name:8: §2§lWhen All You Have is a Hammer...
